text: Charles Konan Banny (11 November 1942 – 10 September 2021Biography at BCEAO website ) was an Ivorian politician. He was the Prime Minister of Côte d'Ivoire from 7 December 2005 until 4 April 2007. Banny died on 10 September 2021 in Paris from COVID-19 at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Ivory Coast Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Paris
title: Charles Konan Banny
